original: This modifier affects the total number of clan chiefs present in our tribe. With more clan chiefs, we will have additional retinues to command, but each clan chief will have their own opinion of our governance.
translation: 这一修正会影响出现在我们部落的氏族酋长总数。氏族酋长越多，我们就能指挥额外的亲兵不会，但是每一位酋长对我们的统治都会有自己的看法。
与统治者家族联姻的家族

original: Amount of Power Conversions this Ruler
translation: 这个统治者的点数转换量

original: Amount of Diplomatic Stance Changes this Ruler
translation: 这个统治者的外交立场改变量

original: This city was recently assaulted by troops belonging to their own armies!
translation: 这座城市最近遭到了他们自己的军队的袭击！

original: This army is utilizing a novel command hierarchy.
translation: 这支军队正在使用一种新的指挥层级制度。

original: This city sports a stunning, privately funded temple complex.
translation: 私人赞助的神殿建筑群美不胜收，这座城市因此极富魅力。
奥林匹克停战期战火再起

original: This city contains the site of the historic Olympic games, where athletes from near and far, come to compete for glory.
translation: 这座城市承载着具有悠久历史的奥运会场地，运动员或来自周边国家，或来自遥远之地，但都奔着同一个目标，即争夺荣誉。

original: Our holy men are refusing to perform rites. This is somewhat embarrassing.
translation: 我们的圣职人员拒绝举行仪式。这真是有点尴尬。
与统治者不在同一派系

original: Merchants seem unusually reticent to bring their wares through our land.
translation: 商人们似乎非常不愿意把他们的货物带入我们的这片土地。

original: Our priests demand increased spending on state rituals.
translation: 我们的祭司要求在国家仪式上投入更多成本。

original: We have granted this city a temporary relief on all sources of taxation.
translation: 我们已经批准暂时减轻这个城市的所有税款。

original: The Military Faction are enjoying a boost in party support, thanks to the actions of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者的行动，军事派系正享受着党派支持的上升。

original: The Civic Faction are enjoying a boost in party support, thanks to the actions of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者的行动，民政派系正享受着党派支持的上升。

original: The Mercantile Faction are enjoying a boost in party support, thanks to the actions of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者的行动，商业派系正享受着党派支持的上升。

original: The Religious Faction are enjoying a boost in party support, thanks to the actions of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者的行动，宗教派系正享受着党派支持的上升。

original: The Populist Faction are enjoying a boost in party support, thanks to the actions of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者的行动，民粹派系正享受着党派支持的上升。

original: Circuses are the best thing since stamped bread!
translation: 除了盖有印章的面包，娱乐就是最好的东西！

original: The common people flock to the temples in droves!
translation: 民众们成群结队地涌向神庙！

original: A small dividend on profits will help us fill our treasury.
translation: 小幅的利润红利将有助于我们填补国库的空缺。

original: We have expanded the local commerce sector in this province.
translation: 我们扩大了此省份的地方贸易部门。

original: Our ranks are being bolstered by fresh-faced recruits, press-ganged from far-flung regions.
translation: 稚嫩的新兵们支撑着我们的队伍，而他们都是通过强征入伍的方式从偏远地区挑选进来的。

original: Releasing funds earmarked for other ventures, has allowed for greater investment into our infrastructure.
translation: 释放专供其他风险项目的资金，使我们的基础设施获得了更大的投入。

original: We have limited the tolerance of exotic religious practices within our borders.
translation: 我们降低了对边境内外来宗教活动的宽容度。

original: We have lowered the tariffs on certain common goods flowing into our ports.
translation: 我们已经降低了流入我们港口的某些大众商品的关税。

original: Increasing the tax on the wealthy will fill our coffers even faster, despite the misgivings of those it is aimed at.
translation: 提高富人税收将使国库得到更快补充，尽管这对预期目标来说依旧是杯水车薪。

original: A certain transparency is required when dealing with criminals. A clearer code of conduct will assist us.
translation: 处置罪犯时需要一定的透明度。一部更清晰的实施法典无疑有助于我们。

original: Enhancing the rights of the tribal councils within our nation is sure to appease the unruly savages, if at a cost.
translation: 若要付出一定代价的话，那么对我们国内部落理事会的权利施以强化，定能安抚那些不守规矩的野蛮人。

original: Adjusting the conduct expected of slave-owners ought to increase productivity greatly, although we may have to turn a blind eye to the consequences.
translation: 调整奴隶主的行为规范应该会大幅度提高生产力，尽管我们可能得对其带来的后果睁一只眼闭一只眼。

original: The barbarian hordes eye our land with gluttonous eyes - we must build a wall to keep ourselves safe.
translation: 蛮族大军用贪婪的目光审视着我们这片土地，因此我们必须要为自己筑起一道坚墙。

original: Our soldiers have gained renewed vigor.
translation: 我们的士兵已精力十足。
我们的士兵正感到沮丧。

original: Our soldiers have given up all hope.
translation: 我们的士兵已放弃所有希望。

original: Forces unknown have razed a number of public buildings in this province.
translation: 未知势力已摧毁此省份中的大量公共建筑。

original: The mystic rituals of druidism sometimes take a darker turn; at least now, the gods themselves watch over our people.
translation: 德鲁伊教的神秘仪式有时结果不佳；但至少现在，众神仍在亲自看护我们的人民。

original: Siege ability is an indicator of how well-trained your troops are at sieging fortifications. A higher value will generally result in shorter sieges.
translation: 围攻能力是你的军队在围攻防御工事上训练程度的指标。这个值越高，围攻所需的时间就越短。

original: Dire straits afford us no leniency - unnecessary expenditure such as the patronage of astronomy and mathematics must be curtailed.
translation: 事态严重，我们没有余裕花钱大手大脚——必须削减对天文学和数学的资助。

original: We have been forced to mistreat some particularly important members of government. Whispers have already begun to circulate.
translation: 我们被迫去虐待一些身份显赫的政府成员。而传言已然开始扩散。

original: Paying for the upkeep of civic buildings is something we simply cannot afford right now.
translation: 当前我们无法担负民政建筑的维修费用。

original: This province will periodically spawn barbarians.
translation: 此省份会定期滋生蛮族。

original: The skill and planning of our government is evident in the increased income we're currently experiencing.
translation: 政府的技能和规划在我们当前增长的收入中显露无遗。

original: The following modifiers are applied multiplicatively:\n
Diplomatic Reputation increases the likelihood that other nations will consider your diplomatic proposals.
translation: 外交声誉增加了其他国家接受你的外交建议的可能性。

original: This value indicates how many countries you can engage in active diplomatic treaties with, at any one time. You may exceed this limit, however, you will receive various penalties.
translation: 这个数值表示同一时间你能与多少个国家保持生效的外交协定。你可以超过这个限制，但将受到不同程度的惩罚。

original: This modifier affects the maximum potential relations impact when using the Improve Relations diplomatic action.
translation: 在使用外交行动改善关系时，这一修正影响可能关系改变的最大值。

original: Morale of Armies is an overall state of the morale of your troops. Higher morale will result in them being able to stay in battle for longer.
translation: 陆军士气是你军队士气的总体状态。更高的士气会使他们能够在战斗中坚持更长时间。

original: Morale of Navies is an overall state of the morale of your ships. Higher morale will result in them being able to stay in battle for longer.
translation: 海军士气是你舰船士气的总体状态。更高的士气会使他们能够在战斗中坚持更长时间。

original: This value represents how heavily fortified this city is. A higher number indicates that a siege is likely to take longer.
translation: 这个数值代表了这座城市的坚固程度。数字越大就表明，围攻这座城市可能需要消耗更长时间。

original: This is how many soldiers are currently present in the city garrison.
translation: 这是目前城市守军中士兵数量。

original: The threat of punishment on a unit scale, can be enough to keep even the most battle-hardened warriors in check.
translation: 威胁惩罚一整支部队，足以约束住最久经沙场的战士。

original: This value modifies the base duration of our omens.
translation: 这个值修正了我们预兆的基础持续时间。

original: This value represents a modifier to the amount of civilization a city can currently support.
translation: 该值表示你的城市目前可以拥有的最高文明度。如果有城市高于此值，将慢慢下降到该等级。

original: This value represents the highest amount of civilization your cities can currently have. If they are higher they will slowly go down to this level.
translation: 该值表示你的城市目前可以拥有的最高文明度。如果有城市高于此值，将慢慢下降到该等级。

original: This value affects the rate at which you will gain civilization in this city. Civilization value can never go above the Civilization level, which can be modified both nationally by government type and locally by local modifiers.
translation: 这个数值影响你获得文明度的速率。不同的国体以及其他因素都对此有影响。TODO

original: This value affects the rate at which you will gain civilization. Civilization value can never go above the Civilization level, which can be modified both nationally by government type and locally by local modifiers.
translation: 这个数值影响你获得文明度的速率。不同的国体以及其他因素都对此有影响。TODO
精锐步兵山地战斗加成
常规步兵山地战斗加成
精锐步兵丛林战斗加成
精锐步兵森林战斗加成
常规步兵丛林战斗加成
常规步兵森林战斗加成
三层划桨战船移动速度
骆驼骑兵沙漠战斗加成

original: Offense is a modifier to all damage dealt in combat.
translation: 进攻影响所有战斗中造成的伤害。

original: Defense is a reduction to all damage received in combat.
translation: 防御减少所有战斗中受到的伤害。

original: The speed at which your ships move between seazones.
translation: 你的船只在海域间移动的速度。

original: The speed at which your cohorts move between cities.
translation: 你的部队在城市间移动的速度。

original: By having our capital situated next to a highly civilized province some of its advanced culture is bound to rub off.
translation: 由于我们的首都毗邻一个高度文明的省份，因此它的某些先进文化必然会浸染而来。

original: Our capital has really grown the last couple of years and turned into a real metropolis. Everyone wants to be a part of the magnificent city we have created.
translation: 在过去的几年里，我们的首都有实实在在的发展壮大，并且已转变成一个真正的大都市。这座由我们所打造的城市尽显雄伟壮丽，使得每个人都想在此安居定所。

original: Exacting tribute from your neighbors may not give you any new friends but it is a rather lucrative business.
translation: 从邻国手中强征贡品可能不会让你结交任何新朋友，但这是一项相当有利可图的生意。

original: By controlling Carthage and Alexandria we have managed to secure the biggest grain producers of the Mediterranean undoubtedly this will spur our economy.
translation: 控制了迦太基和亚历山大，我们已成功拿下地中海最大的两个粮食生产地，毫无疑问这将刺激我国的经济增长。

original: By owning the largest grain producers of the Mediterranean we have the market under our control
translation: 拥有这地中海最大的粮食生产地，我们就能掌控整个市场

original: Ownership of Petra and Tabuk gives us control of all trade passing from India and Arabia to the Mediterranean.
translation: 拥有佩特拉和塔布克这两座城市，使我们能够垄断从印度和阿拉伯到地中海的所有贸易。

original: By establishing a link between China and the Mediterranean our trade income has reached new heights.
translation: 建立起中国与地中海间的联系，我们的贸易收入再创高峰。

original: Athens has long been a center of culture and philosophy and many of our nation's greatest scholars call it their home.
translation: 长期以来，雅典一直是文化中心和哲学中心，我们国家许多最伟大的学者都将它当作自己的归属地。

original: The two biggest libraries of the known world reside within our borders
translation: 已知的世界上两个最大的图书馆都坐落在我国

original: We are the proud owners of the great libraries of Alexandria and Pergamon and the cultural city of Athens that make us the predominant cultural and scientific power of the world.
translation: 我们很自豪能够拥有亚历山大和帕加马的伟大图书馆，以及雅典这座文化名城，它们让我们成为世界上卓越的文化和科学大国。
我们在亚历山大的港口

original: The glorious city of Rome is no longer under Roman control.
translation: 辉煌之城罗马已不再受罗马人控制。

original: The glorious city of Alexandria is no longer under Egyptian control
translation: 辉煌之城亚历山大已不再受埃及人控制

original: The great coastal city of Carthage is no longer under Carthaginian control and they never even saw it coming.
translation: 伟大的沿海城市迦太基已不再受迦太基人的控制，他们甚至从未预料过此事。

original: By controlling both sides of the Bosporus sound we are able to tax all ships sailing between the Mediterranean and the Black Sea.
translation: 控制住博斯普鲁斯海峡的两侧，我们能够对在地中海和黑海之间航行的所有船只征收通行费。

original: Our people are starving. We don't have enough resources and our trade is too underdeveloped.
translation: 我们的人民遭受饥荒。我们财力不够，贸易也不发达。

original: You can't reach much higher than being elevated to the status of a God.
translation: 神位已经是你所能达到的最高点。

original: The large Seleucid capital is finally ours.
translation: 塞琉古巨都终于是我们的了。

original: Our sculptural works are unmatched by any others
translation: 我们的雕塑品是无与伦比的

original: By incorporating more civilized provinces into our domain we have learned new building techniques that allow us to be more efficient.
translation: 将更文明的省份纳入我们的领域之后，我们学会了能提高我们效率的新建筑技术。

original: In a society such as ours we can't tolerate large sects trying to influence our populace it creates too much rupture.
translation: 在如我们这般的社会中，我们不能容忍那些试图影响我们民众的大教派，它造成了太多的不和。

original: We need to settle all boundary issues once and for all
translation: 我们需要一劳永逸地解决所有边境问题

original: Due to very good relations with our neighbors we have been able to share some of their military research.
translation: 由于与我们的邻国关系很好，我们已经能够共享他们的一些军事研究成果。

original: Large hordes of barbarians have been harassing our people and the only way to keep them at bay is to pay tribute until we are strong enough to defeat them.
translation: 大批蛮族一直在骚扰我们的人民，而唯一能使他们远离的方法就是向他们缴贡，直到我们强大到足以击败他们。

original: We should pay closer attention to our border provinces. There is a great risk that they will slip into barbarian control if we don't build a road or at least station some troops there.
translation: 我们应将更多注意力放在边境省份。若我们不修建一条道路或至少在那里部署一些部队，它们就会陷入受蛮族控制的危险之中。

original: Having a large city so close to our capital has led to many merchants seeking new trade opportunities in our humble city.
translation: 有这么一座大城市如此靠近我们首都，以至于许多商人都在我们这个不起眼的城市寻找新的贸易机会。

original: Other countries are adopting many of our religious ideas and beliefs.
translation: 其他国家正在采纳我们的许多宗教理念和信仰。

original: Our philosophers are frequently visiting the academy of our neighbor
translation: 我们的哲学家经常访问邻国的学术团体

original: Our neighbor has long been a thorn in our side but by recruiting barbarian mercenaries we can speed up the recruitment process thus once and for all rid us of this menace.
translation: 长期以来，邻国一直是我们的眼中钉，但通过招募蛮族佣兵我们可以加快征兵进程，从而彻底拔除这颗钉子。

original: We have received military support from one of our neighbors to help us fight off the barbarian threat
translation: 一个邻国对我们实行了军事援助，以此来帮助我们击退蛮族的威胁

original: One of the most significant oracles of the Greek world is giving us wise counsel.
translation: 希腊世界最重要的先知之一正在给予我们锦囊妙计。

original: World domination is within our grasp.
With both Carthage and Sicily under our rule we have complete control over all ships crossing the Mediterranean.
translation: 在将迦太基和西西里岛纳入统治版图后，我们已控制住了所有在地中海通行的船只。

original: No Greek competition is greater or more enjoyable than the Panhellenic Games
translation: 没有哪个希腊竞赛能比泛希腊运动会规模更大更令人快乐

original: Due to a shortage of money we are finding it hard to supply our troops in the field with replacement equipment.
translation: 由于资金短缺，我们发现很难替前线部队更换装备。

original: The Gods have been really generous toward us the last couple of years.
translation: 在过去的几年中，诸神对我们尽显慷慨。

original: A contented population is far easier to take advantage of...
A good omen has really increased our troops' morale.
translation: 一个好预兆确实提升了我们部队的士气。

original: A bad omen has really decreased our troops' morale.
translation: 一个坏预兆确实降低了我们部队的士气。

original: Our troops are beginning to lose faith in your cause.
translation: 我们的部队开始对你的事业失去信心。

original: Your magistrate is very effective when it comes to collecting taxes.
translation: 你的政务官在收税方面有很大作用。

original: Your magistrate is very effective when it comes to collecting taxes.
translation: 你的政务官在收税方面有很大作用。

original: One of our temple is currently undergoing extensive reparations.
translation: 我们的一座神庙正在进行大规模的整修。

original: One of our temples is about to fall into pieces.
translation: 我们的一座神庙即将倒塌。

original: Your legate has implemented some very effective reforms.
translation: 你的司令官已经实施了一些卓有成效的改革措施。

original: The amount of salt currently available is not even close to our demand.
translation: 目前可用的盐量甚至无法满足我们的需求。

original: Our iron production is far from being as successful as we had anticipated.
translation: 我们的铁生产远没有预期中的那么成功。

original: Extensive use of cavalry instead of just relying on foot soldiers serves us well.
translation: 大量使用骑兵而不是仅依靠步兵，这点对我们很有帮助。

original: One of our vineyards has produced exceptionally good wines this year.
translation: 今年我们的一个葡萄园出产了格外优质的葡萄酒。

original: Our trade relations are suffering since we haven't been able to meet our neighbors demands.
translation: 由于无法满足邻国的要求，我们的贸易关系正在遭受损害。

original: No other country can compete with us when it comes to architectural wonders.
translation: 在建筑奇观领域，没有哪个国家能与我们竞争。

original: Despite several years of bad harvests our people do not have to starve since the supply of fish is enormous.
translation: 多年以来尽管收成不好，但由于有庞大的供鱼量，我们的人民依旧不必挨饿。

original: A poor spice harvest has had a rather negative impact on our trade.
translation: 糟糕的香料收成对我们的贸易产生了相当不好的影响。

original: By incorporating elephants into the ranks of our armies we gain a great advantage in battle.
translation: 通过将大象纳入军队行列，我们在战斗中获得了巨大的优势。

original: The morale of our army has never been higher and there are never any problems to find new recruits
translation: 我们军队的士气从未如现在这般高涨，而在征募新兵方面我们也从未遇到任何问题

original: Its getting harder and harder to find new recruits and the morale of our army is far from what is has been
translation: 征募新兵正变得愈发艰难，并且我们军队的士气远不复当初

original: By making the Cavalry man the elite of our army we have been able to maximize our armies effectiveness.
translation: 通过让骑兵成为我们军队的精锐，我们能够最大化军队效率。

original: Unfortunately skill doesn't seem to be the main criteria when appointing new commanders.
translation: 不幸的是，在任命新指挥官时，本领似乎并不是主要标准。

original: By investing a lot in our navy we have improved its status and morale immensely.
translation: 通过大幅投资海军，我们极大地提高了它的状态和士气。

original: The morale of our army has never been higher.
translation: 我们军队的士气从未如这般高涨。

original: The miserable state of our army is decreasing our troops morale and discipline.
translation: 我们军队的惨状正在降低部队士气和纪律。

original: It has become both faster and easier to organize the recruitment of new troops.
translation: 征募新部队变得更快更容易。

original: Despite all our attempts to make army recruitment faster and more effective it has proven to be quite a hassle.
translation: 尽管我们试图让征兵变得更快、更有效率，但事实证明这是相当麻烦的。

original: By providing specialized military camps where our troops can be trained we have improved the quality and overall organization of our armies.
translation: 通过提供专业军营供部队进行训练，我们提高了军队的质量并改善了其整体组织。

original: The organization of our army is sorely lacking and our soldiers are not nearly as well trained
translation: 我们的军队非常缺乏组织度，并且我们的士兵也没有经受过良好训练

original: The Cataphracts serve as the backbone of our army.
translation: 重骑兵是我们军队的支柱。

original: We haven't really been able to incorporate the Cataphracts successfully into our armies.
translation: 我们还未能成功将骑兵融入到我们的军队中。

original: Our veterans serve as a great inspiration for our new recruits.
translation: 退伍军人给予我们的新兵很大鼓舞。

original: It appears as though we have fallen behind when it comes to military advancements.
translation: 在军事进展方面，我们似乎已经落后了。

original: An old friend of yours has just returned from one of his trips and he has brought a lot of foreign thoughts and ideas with him
translation: 你的一位老朋友刚刚从一次远行中归来，他带回了很多外来思想和理念

original: By investing so much time in our army we have almost forgotten about our navy
translation: 由于在陆军方面投入了太多时间，以至于我们几乎忘记了海军的存在

original: We have directed our focus from our army to our navy.
translation: 我们把焦点从陆军转移到了海军身上。

original: By making it each citizen's duty to defend our state we have increased our armies efficiency considerably.
translation: 通过让每位公民都有保家卫国的义务，我们大大提高了军队的效率。

original: The idea of making it every citizen's duty to defend our state has not gained much support.
translation: 让每位公民都有保家卫国义务的想法，并没有得到多少响应。

original: The idea of converting freedmen to citizens has received a lot of support from almost all members of our government.
translation: 将自由民转化为公民的想法得到了我们政府几乎所有成员的大力支持。

original: The idea of converting freedmen to citizens has received a lot of critique from several of our most influential politicians.
translation: 将自由民转化为公民的想法受到了一些政客大腕们的强烈批判。

original: The idea of granting slaves certain right has received a lot of support from almost all members of our government.
translation: 授予奴隶一定权利的想法得到了我们政府几乎所有成员的大力支持。

original: The idea of granting slaves certain right has received a lot of critique from several of our most influential politicians.
translation: 授予奴隶一定权利的想法受到了一些政客大腕们的强烈批判。

original: Double-dealing has become something of an art form for quite a few of our diplomats.
translation: 对于我们的相当一部分外交官来说，两面三刀已经成为一种艺术形式。

original: By allowing our philosophers more freedom to develop new ideas we have created a more open society.
translation: 通过允许我们的哲学家有更多自由去发展新理念，我们造就了一个更开明的社会。

original: Our political scene is completely chaotic.
translation: 我们的政治局势一片混乱。

original: The implementation of several minor reforms for the common people has actually had a very positive impact on our stability.
translation: 为民众实施的几项小规模改革实际上非常有利于我们的稳定。

original: Despite our government's attempt to please the mob they never seem content.
translation: 尽管我们的政府试图取悦暴民，但他们似乎从不满足。

original: By streamlining the way we work we have been able to increase our efficiency.
translation: 我们已经能够通过简化工作方式来提高我们的效率。

original: We really need to rework our recruitment process.
translation: 我们真的需要重新设计我们的征兵流程。

original: The time and money we have invested in naval tactics and our navy overall finally seems to bear fruit.
translation: 我们在海军战术和海军方面投入的时间和财力最终似乎取得了成果。

original: By investing so much time and money in our navy we have neglected our army.
translation: 由于在海军方面投入了如此多的时间和财力，以至于我们忽视了陆军的存在。

original: For some reason taxes aren't generating as much revenue as it used to.
translation: 由于某些原因，税收并不会像以前那样产生那么多的收入。

original: By incorporating some ingenious ideas made by one of the architects our latest project will be finished much earlier than we had planned.
translation: 整合了一位建筑师的某些独具匠心的想法，我们最新的工程项目将比当初预计的更早完成。

original: By investing a lot of time and effort into educating socially responsible leaders we have been able to make our society much more efficient.
translation: 在投入了大量时间和精力培养具有社会责任感的领袖后，我们已经能够让我们的社会运转得更高效。

original: Our desire to educate our people to be as socially responsible as they possibly can has lead to a lot of nitpicking and disagreements.
translation: 我们希望教育人民尽可能地承担社会责任，但这可能导致了许多吹毛求疵和分歧。

original: The trading conditions for our merchants have improved considerably since we decided to regulate our market.
translation: 自从我们决定对市场进行调整后，商人的贸易状况已经得到了很大改善。

original: By encouraging industries to supply material for new buildings our efficiency has increased considerably.
translation: 通过鼓励产业为新建筑提供材料，我们的效率得到了极大提高。

original: The material that we ordered has been delayed for reasons unknown.
translation: 我们订购的材料因不明原因被推迟了。

original: By adopting the idea of a strict organization of all economic matters we have been able to get rid of all the middlemen and thereby decreased the cost of recruitment.
translation: 采纳了严格组织所有经济相关事务的想法，我们已经能够摆脱所有的中间人，从而降低了征兵成本。

original: A good omen has increased our people's faith in the government.
translation: 一个好预兆增加了我们人民对政府的信心。

original: Our government seem to have some difficulties interpreting omens correctly.
translation: 我们的政府似乎在正确解读预兆方面存在一些困难。

original: The oracle's ill-boding prophecy has upset our people.
translation: 先知的不祥预言使我们的人民感到不安。

original: We have decided to put all our trust in the gods
translation: 我们决定将所有的信任都寄托于众神

original: There are some disagreements regarding how the last omen should be interpreted.
translation: 在如何解读最后的预兆方面存在一些分歧。

original: We have created a society built on the best parts of every religion.
translation: 我们创造了一个奠基于所有宗教精髓的社会。

original: There are some minor religious groups struggling to be accepted.
translation: 一些小的宗教团体在努力获取认可。

original: Our attempts to make our pantheon the dominating one has met some success.
translation: 为使我们的神系成为主宰，我们所尝试付出的努力已取得一些成果。

original: A terrible storm has shook our lands for days and yesterday lightning hit one of our larger temples and people are viewing this as a very bad omen.
translation: 一场可怕的暴风雨使我们这片土地震荡多日，闪电昨天击中了我们的一座规模较大的神庙，人们都认为这是一个极为不祥的预兆。

original: Our philosophers have made several advancements.
translation: 我们的哲学家已经取得了一些进展。

original: Having several senior priests working together has proven very advantageous.
translation: 有几位资深祭司协同合作已证实是非常有益的。

original: Having several senior priests working together has created nothing less than chaos.
translation: 让几位资深祭司协同合作，却制造出了一场混乱。

original: Our faith is gaining more prestige by the day as new believers join us.
translation: 随着新信徒加入我们的行列，我们的信仰在一天天地累积声望。

original: Our faith doesn't seem to be very appealing to the large masses.
translation: 我们的信仰对广大群众似乎没有太大吸引力。

original: Through luck and good fortune, a sizable quantity of the land surrounding this city have fallen into the hands of the state.
translation: 由于财运亨通，这个城市周围的大量土地已经落入国家手中。

original: This modifier affects how much aggressive expansion you will receive when conquering land.
translation: 该修正影响你征服土地时会增加的侵略扩张数值。

original: This value affects the rate at which your aggressive expansion will decay over time.
translation: 这个数值影响你的侵略性扩张值随时间衰减的速率。

original: This value affects the rate at which your aggressive expansion will decay over time.
translation: 这个数值影响你的侵略性扩张值随时间缩减的速率。

original: Discipline is a measure of how organized your units are. It provides a multiplier to all damage done and received in combat.
translation: 训练度衡量你方部队的组织程度。它提供了一个在战斗中造成伤害和承受伤害的乘数。

original: Fort defense indicates how well built your defensive emplacements are. Higher fort defense will result in longer sieges for your opponents.
translation: 要塞防御表明了你的防御设施建设得有多好。更高的要塞防御将导致你的对手围攻更长的时间。

original: There is a small amount of barbarian activity in this area.
translation: 这片地区有少量蛮族活跃。

original: There appears to be a considerable amount of barbarian footfall in this area.
translation: 这片地区似乎有相当多的蛮族足迹。

original: A vast number of barbarians are active in this area.
translation: 大批蛮族活跃在这片地区。

original: The temples and fanes in this city have been sacked by rapacious hordes!
translation: 这座城市的神庙和圣地被贪婪的游牧部落洗劫一空！

original: In order to facilitate the recovery and restoration of this area after a violent volcanic eruption, we have granted the province an exemption from most taxes to the central treasury.
translation: 为了帮助这片地区从一次猛烈的火山喷发后恢复和重建，我们已从中央财政中豁免了该省份的大部分税收。

original: This area has been hit by a powerful volcanic eruption. The effects are still being felt and will be for some time.
translation: 这片地区遭受了一次强烈的火山喷发。这种影响仍然存在，而且将持续一段时间。

original: The privately owned lands in this city are draining resources from the state.
translation: 这座城市的私有土地正在消耗国家的资源。

original: The local population of this city is largely made up of Macedonian and Greek veterans from Alexanders wars. There is widespread unrest in this city after its reconquest from the Greek satraps he left behind.
translation: 这座城市的当地居民大部分都是经历过亚历山大战争的马其顿人和希腊人老兵。而自从将这座城市从亚历山大留下的希腊总督手里夺回后，它就出现了普遍动荡。

original: The winds of trade have blessed this city with a prosperous future.
translation: 信风造就了这座城市现在和未来的繁荣。

original: This city is developing a good reputation as a trade hub. Growing interest results in a swiftly developing infrastructure!
translation: 作为一个贸易中心，这座城市正在积累良好声誉。日益增长的利润使其基础设施发展迅速！

original: This city is undergoing an enthusiastic festival, in honor of their governor.
translation: 这座城市正在举行一个热闹非凡的节日，以此纪念他们的领导者。

original: The residents of this city are disappointed in our response to their complaints.
translation: 我们对抗议的回应让这座城市的居民感到非常失望。

original: This city has been ravaged by a terrible storm!
translation: 这座城市被一场可怕的风暴蹂躏了！

original: This army is under the grip of a nascent tyrant, and are refusing all orders.
translation: 这支军队在一名新兴僭主的掌控之下，拒绝所有的命令。

original: This city has an enlarged tax district, having been granted land previously belonging to their neighbor.
translation: 这座城市的税收区域扩大，获赐了原属于他们邻居的土地。

original: This city is up in arms, having been forced to give away land to a neighboring rival.
translation: 这座城市由于被迫将土地交给邻近的宿敌，目前正处于愤怒之中。

original: This city has recently been forced to give up spoils of war, by military means.
translation: 这座城市最近在军事威胁下被迫放弃战利品。

original: This city is stockpiling manpower, equipment and supplies, ready to defend against, or make war upon a neighbor.
translation: 这座城市正在储备人力、装备和补给品，准备防御或侵略邻近势力。

original: There is a great deal of religious resentment in this city.
translation: 这个城市有大量宗教骚乱。

original: Widespread discontent with our policies to settle people of our state culture in this region is creating disturbances in this city.
translation: 我们的国家文化人口在这个地区殖民的政策造成了普遍不满，令这座城市动乱不休。

original: The population of state culture settlers in this city has run into considerable trouble with the locals. The unwillingness of the central government to help them means that this settlement is now struggling.
translation: 移居这座城市的本国文化人口与当地人发生了巨大的纷争。中央政府不愿作为则意味着这处定居点正在挣扎求存。

original: The wholehearted support of the central government has strengthened relations with the local population in this city.
translation: 中央政府的全心支持增强了与该城当地居民的关系。

original: The royal consorts martial talents have been put to good use, inspiring the army.
translation: 王室配偶的军事才能被充分利用，鼓舞了军队。

original: The royal consorts martial talents have been put to good use, inspiring the army.
translation: 王室配偶的军事才能被充分利用，鼓舞了军队。

original: By embracing the Serapis cult we have tried to create a syncretic religion for both Egyptians and the wider Hellenic world.
translation: 通过拥抱塞拉皮斯教派，我们试图为埃及人和更广泛的希腊世界创造一种融合的宗教。

original: This is one of the foremost persons in the growing royal Serapis cult.
translation: 这是日益增长的王室塞拉皮斯崇拜中最重要的人物之一。

original: This city is home to a temple of the Muses. A great sanctuary of learning with the ambition of collecting all literature in Greek ever written. New translations are also being made of any non Greek literature of quality for the benefit of the wider Greek audience.
translation: 一座缪斯神庙坐落于这座城市之中。这是有着收藏希腊所有文献野心的学习圣地。任何优质的非希腊文学也在此翻译，为了更广泛希腊读者的利益。

original: This city was founded by Alexander the Great with the intention of solidifying the hold of Hellenic culture over the entire region. He also went to great lengths to plan and fund the infrastructure to support a great city in the future.
translation: 这座城市是亚历山大大帝为巩固整个地区希腊文化支配地位而建立的。他还不遗余力地规划和资助基础建设，以支持其在未来成为伟大的城市。

original: Built thousands of years ago there are no works of construction that can measure up to the Great Pyramids of Egypt. Ever since they were built they have continued to attract the attention of faraway travelers while also serving as a constant reminder of how ancient the native Egyptian Culture truly is.
translation: 即使建造在数千年之前，至今也没有建筑工程可以与埃及大金字塔比肩。自建成以来，它们一直吸引着远方游客并不断的提醒人们：埃及本土文化是多么的古老。

original: Babylon is a city that is as ancient as it is famous. The fabled Gardens of Babylon were built along a grand palace known as 'The Marvel of Mankind' by Nebuchadnezzar II, hundreds of years ago. The gardens remain a testament to the Neo Babylonian Empire and impress noble and commoner alike around the world.
translation: 巴比伦之城历史悠久，名冠天下。传说中的巴比伦空中花园，连同一座华丽的宫殿，由尼布甲尼撒二世修建于数百年前，被称为人类史上的奇迹。在新巴比伦帝国时期，这座花园仍然是帝国的象征，给贵族与平民都留下深刻的印象。

original: Greek settlers in this city are upset that the state is not catering to them. They are accusing our state of having turned its back at the greek world.
translation: 城市中的希腊定居者们沮丧于国家并不欢迎他们。他们控告我们的国家负于希腊世界。

original: We have bravely defended Hellenic ideals and the Olympic gods in the face of the locals and their unsophisticated, if ancient, culture.
translation: 面对当地人和他们朴素且古老的文化，我们仍然勇敢地捍卫了希腊的理想和奥林匹克诸神。

original: Steps have been taken to increase the centralization of our nation.
translation: 我们已采取措施以增加我们国家的集权。

original: Our people are naturally gathering together in the tribal centers of our nation.
translation: 我们的人民自然地聚集在我国的部落中心。

original: After a local religious festival, it has become a center for the local community.
translation: 当地宗教节庆之后，它已经成为本地社区的中心。

original: Has received some aid so they can do their job better.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetSheHe]因获得了援助所以可以更好地进行[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]的工作。

original: Has received some aid so they can do their job better.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetSheHe]因获得了援助所以可以更好地进行[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]的工作。

original: Has received some aid so they can do their job better.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetSheHe]因获得了援助所以可以更好地进行[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]的工作。

original: Has received some aid so they can do their job better.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetSheHe]因获得了援助所以可以更好地进行[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]的工作。

original: Has been blessed by the gods themselves.
Efforts have been put into centralizing the realm ever more.
translation: 已尽力使境内更集权化。

original: Efforts have been put into keeping the realm decentralized.
translation: 已尽力使境内分权而治。

original: Our Warchief have spent a noticeable amount of time to inspire loyalty of the people of this province.
translation: 我们的战争酋长花了大量时间来激发这个省份人民的忠诚。

original: Rumors has it our disloyal Warchief has caused some unrest in this province.
translation: 传闻我们不忠诚的战争酋长在这个省份引起了一些骚乱。
这位财政总管近期资金拮据。

original: The clan promised to support the nation with more troops if they were given land.
translation: 该氏族承诺如果他们能获得土地，就会派出更多军队支持国家。

original: The clan promised to support the nation with more gold if they were given land.
translation: 该氏族承诺如果他们能获得土地，就会提供更多金币支持国家。

original: Known for their great leadership skills.
translation: 因[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]杰出的领导能力闻名。

original: Have made impressive moves for the sake of their clan.
translation: 为[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]的氏族做出了令人印象深刻的行动。

original: Despite high expectations, they ended up being a disappointing leader of the clan.
translation: 虽被赋予厚望，[CHARACTER.GetSheHe]却一直是氏族中令人失望的首领。

original: A terrible leader of the clan, and rightfully disliked for it.
translation: 一位糟糕的氏族首领理所当然地被人厌恶。
一位杰出的政治演说家。

original: An Inarticulate leader who has disappointed their clan.
translation: 一位不善言辞的首领，让[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]氏族非常失望。

original: Well known for their tendencies to say all the wrong things at all the right times.
translation: 以[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]总能在正确的时间说错误的事情闻名。

original: Known for their respect for the divine.

translation: 一位受欢迎的宗教首领。
一位不受欢迎的无信仰首领。

original: Known for their complete lack of respect or care for the divine.
translation: 因[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]对神灵缺乏尊敬闻名。

original: Respected as one of the Champions of the clan, known for their undeniable prowess in battle.
translation: 因[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]无可争辩的高超战斗技艺而被尊为氏族的捍卫者。

original: This city has seen a noticeable population influx lately.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetName]最近发生了引人注目的人口流入。

original: This city has seen a noticeable population efflux lately.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetName]最近发生了引人注目的人口流失。

original: Some of the people who used to live here have recently been moved to a new province, leaving the community poorer for it.
translation: 曾经居住在此地的一些人最近迁居到了一个新的省份，导致这个地区更加贫困。

original: Has kept to their tribal traditions even if some of their people have left for a more civilized nation.
translation: 即使他们的一些人已经离开去了一个更加文明的国家，[CHARACTER.GetName]仍然坚持他们的部落传统。

original: The chieftains have recently demanded and received more authority.
translation: 酋长们最近要求并获得了更多的权力。

original: This country is benefiting from their proximity with a civilized neighbor.
translation: 这个国家从他们文明的邻邦身上获得了益处。

original: There has been a large influx of tribesmen from a neighboring tribe to this province lately.
translation: 这个省份最近涌入了大量临近部落的移民。

original: This province struggles with troublemakers gone amok.
translation: 这个省份与狂乱的闹事者斗得不可开交。

original:
There is an election each $TOTAL|Y$ years. The duration between elections is due to:
$GOVFORM$: $BASE|Y$
$WHY$
A $TITLE$ can not be re-elected until $DELAY|R$ years have passed since the end of the last term.
translation:
每$TOTAL|Y$将举行一次选举。选举的时间间隔取决于：
$GOVFORM$：$BASE|Y$
$WHY$
一个$TITLE$直到最近一次选举$DELAY|R$年后才可再次选举。

original: As a result of political maneuvering, we have lessened tax the burden on the rich.
translation: 由于政治操纵，我们减轻了富人的税负。

original: We have limited the time that priests can spend performing the sacred rites.
translation: 我们限制了祭司执行宗教仪式的时间。

original: The common people are furious at our latest political maneuvers!
translation: 平民对我们最近的政治行动大为不满！

original: To keep the commoners happy, we have closed an important trade route to our capital.
translation: 为了让平民开心，我们关闭了一条通往首都的重要贸易路线。

original: This city is recovering from having been raided from the sea.
translation: 这座城市曾被来自海上的敌人劫掠，正在从中恢复。

original: We have drained this province of fighting men, resulting in mistrust amongst the populace.
translation: 我们已经榨干了这个省份的可征召人口，导致了平民的不信任。

original: This province suffers from pirates frequently raiding its shores.
translation: 这个省份沿海经常遭到海盗袭击。

original: The nation has spent a significant amount of resources to improve this province.
translation: 这个国家花费了大量的资源来改善这个省份。

original: A great statue has been raised in this city, standing as a testament of their loyalty.
translation: 这座城市矗立着一座宏伟的雕像，以作为他们忠诚的证明。

original: A statue the city had come together to put up, has been ripped down, and the memory of the dishonor still lingers in their minds.
translation: 城市共同竖立的雕像被拆掉了，耻辱的记忆仍在他们的脑海中萦绕。

original: The monarch has declared that they are the manifestation of a god.
translation: 该君主宣称其为一位神祗的显现。

original: Rather than displacing the local people, we have elected to promote their cultural and religious customs.
translation: 我们没有更改当地人的传统，而是选择推广他们的文化和宗教习俗。

original: Local customs are being aggressively displaced in favor of the elite culture and religion.
translation: 地方习俗正被精英的文化和宗教侵略取代。

original: Our ruler is refusing to hand back dictatorial power.
translation: 我们的统治者拒绝交还独裁权。

original: Our ruler has instituted an extended term duration, to oversee the safe return of democracy.
translation: 我们的统治者为了监督民主的回归延长了自己的任期。

original: Our entire nation is aware of the attempted assassination of our own ruler, from our own senate.
translation: 全国都意识到了我们元老院对统治者暗杀未遂。

original: We have put to death all those who stood against us in our recent civil war.
translation: 我们把所有在最近的内战中对抗我们的人都处死了。

original: Our nation has made it a point of pride to support the arts.
translation: 对艺术的支持已成为我们国家值得骄傲之处。

original: This character has recently helped someone out of bankruptcy.
translation: 这个人物最近帮助某人摆脱了破产。

original: A famous wiseman is making sure they receive the best possible treatment.
translation: 一位著名的智者可以向[CHARACTER.GetName]确保[CHARACTER.GetSheHe]尽可能健康。

original: A famous wiseman is keeping the people of this province healthy.
translation: 一位著名的智者正维护着该省份人民的健康。

original: The Oracle of Delphi have seen negative tidings for our nation.
translation: 得尔斐神谕为我国带来了坏消息。

original: The Oracle of Delphi have seen good times for our nation.
translation: 得尔斐神谕为我国带来了好消息。

original: The country has been granted a blessing of olives by the Goddess of Wisdom.
translation: 该国已被智慧女神授予了橄榄枝祝福。

original: The city has built a small shrine to the Goddess of Wisdom.
translation: 该城市已为智慧女神修建了一座小型神殿。

original: This country has been blessed by the god of war.
translation: 该国已被战争之神祝福。

original: This country has been blessed by the god of the forge.
translation: 该国已被锻造之神祝福。

original: This country has been blessed by the goddess of wisdom.
translation: 该国已被智慧女神祝福。

original: This country has been blessed by the god of the sea.
translation: 该国已被海洋之神祝福。

original: We find ourselves blessed by the god of wine after building a shrine in his honor.
translation: 在以酒神之名建造圣地之后，我们发现自己已被其祝福。

original: This city suffers under the wild Maenads.
translation: 这座城市被疯狂的迈那得斯们折磨。

original: This city is well known as one of the major cities along the Heraclean Path
translation: 这个城市以作为赫拉克利航线上最重要的城市之一而著名

original: This country has recently held a celebration in honor of the god of strength.
translation: 该国最近举办了一场庆祝活动，以纪念大力神。

original: We have sponsored the great epic tale of the Argonautica.
translation: 我们赞助了伟大的史诗故事：阿尔戈船英雄纪。

original: We have sponsored a great epic, proving ourselves as patrons of the arts.
translation: 我们赞助了一部伟大的史诗，证明自己是艺术的赞助者。

original: A man said to be blessed by the god of war himself leads our soldiers.
translation: 一个据说被战神亲自祝福的男人领导着我们的战士。

original: This city has seen a huge influx of traders and travelers lately.
translation: 这座城市最近有大量商人和游客涌入。

original: This country has been blessed by the god of commerce.
We have been blessed by Melqart after sending a gift to Tyrus.
translation: 在向提洛献祭之后我们已经被美刻尔祝福了。

original: The tribesmen around this city are up in arms at our involvement in their lifestyle.
translation: 这座城市周围的部落民竭力反对我们介入他们的生活方式。

original: The tribesmen around this city are outraged at our imposition of strictures.
translation: 这座城市周围的部落民对我们的强加约束非常愤慨。

original: Extremely pleased to be awarded this position, after having desired it for so long. A happy commander is often a benevolent commander.
translation: [CHARACTER.GetName]在渴望已久后，对被提拔到这个职位非常满意。一位愉悦的指挥官往往是一位和善的指挥官。

original: Greatly pleased at their latest assignment, after such a long history of serving the nation.
translation: 在效忠[CHARACTER.GetEmployer.GetName]已久之后，[CHARACTER.GetName]对[CHARACTER.GetHerHis]最近的调动感到非常愉快。

original: The spirit of Rome invigorates our architects!
translation: 罗马的精神激励着我们的建筑师！

original: The mysterious God of Tutorials has blessed us with additional trade capacity.
translation: 神秘的教导之神已经赐予了我们额外的贸易能力。

original: This city is the center of the worship of Anu, and an important regional administrative and religious focal point.
translation: 这个城市是安神信仰的中心，也是重要的地区行政和宗教事务聚焦点。

original: This country has not treated Ba'al with the respect he and his followers demanded.
translation: 该国没有像他和他的追随者所要求的那样尊重[COUNTRY.Custom('get_harvest_god')]。

original: This country has been blessed by Ba'al.
A goddess blessed them with unnatural fertility.
translation: 一位女神祝福了[CHARACTER.GetHerHim]多子多孙。

original: This character has been forever immortalized with a stele describing their rule.
translation: 该人物以一座石碑镌刻他们的法则而永生。

original: A small shrine dedicated to the local god of Shadrafa.
translation: 一座专用于供奉本地神明Shadrafa的祭坛。

original: This city had a blessed harvest.
This country had a harvest blessed by Ba'al.
The country built a shrine to Melqart.
translation: 该城市已为[COUNTRY.Custom('get_commerce_god')]修建了一座小型神殿。

original: The country has built a shrine to Ba'al.
translation: 该城市已为[COUNTRY.Custom('get_sky_god')]修建了一座小型神殿。

original: The country has built a shrine to the Moon Goddess.
translation: 该城市已为[COUNTRY.Custom('get_love_goddess')]修建了一座小型神殿。

original: People have started following a local faith inspired by Melqart.
translation: 人民开始追随受一种麦勒卡特启发的当地信仰。

original: The druids residing here is currently in the middle of a conflict with their neighbors, and deeply disappointed in their ruler for not supporting them.
translation: 居住在这里的德鲁伊目前正与他们的邻居发生冲突，且对他们的统治者不支持他们深感失望。

original: Our troops have been inspired for war by our druids.
translation: 我们的军队受到了德鲁伊的战争鼓舞。

original: Our populace have been inspired for war by our druids.
translation: 我们的民众受到了德鲁伊的战争鼓舞。

original: We suffer from a religious conflict between druids and our ruler.
translation: 我们正遭受德鲁伊和我们的统治者之间的宗教冲突。

original: The stars themselves have blessed our wars, and our troops are more certain of the victories to come.
translation: 星星都为我们的战争祝福，我们的军队对未来的胜利更加信心满满。

original: Our nation has made sure the druids pay their part in the society.
translation: 我们的国家已确保德鲁伊为他们在社会上的地位有所付出。

original: The proud people of Crete have long been admired for their cultural, artistic, and administrative talent. This is the site of a unified Cretan administration, ushering in a new era for this island of prosperity.
translation: 骄傲的克里特岛人民长期以来因其文化，艺术与行政才能而备受推崇。这是统一的克里特政府的所在地，为这个繁荣的岛屿开创了一个新时代。

original: Our ruler has proven to have questionable morales, and become unpopular among the populace of the city.
translation: 我们的统治者已被证明有道德问题，开始在这座城市的人民中变得不受欢迎。

original: Our nation have spent considerable resources to appease Maat.
translation: 我国花费了大量的资源来安抚玛亚特。

original: Facing a national crisis, a local oracle helped us find guidance.
translation: 当面对国家危机时，一名当地的先知指引了我们。

original: Our nation has helped the construction of a huge temple to the Moon Goddess.
translation: 我国协助建造了一座[COUNTRY.Custom('get_love_goddess')]的宏伟神庙。

original: We have forced the temples open to the populace at large.
translation: 我们已经迫使神庙向所有民众开放。

original: The temples are closed to the general populace.
translation: 神庙不向普通民众开放。

original: The inhabitants of this city are content with their current state of being.
translation: 这座城市的居民对目前的生活状态非常满意。

original: These mountains are home to extensive and ancient forests of Cedars, some are said to be thousands of years old, while others have been replanted by the local woodcutters. The region's fabled forests have provided wood for great ships for generations.
translation: 这些山上有大量的古老的雪松林，有些据说已有几千年的历史，而另一些则是由当地的樵夫改种而来。传说中该地区的森林为好几代传奇船只提供了木材。

original: Tyrian Purple is one of the most sought after dyes in the world and nowhere is the production of dyes such an integral part of the local economy as here. Every year thousands of sea snails are fermented in great vats, in order to produce more of the deep red color.
translation: 提尔紫是世界上最受追捧的染料之一，而且没有哪个地方的染料生产能像这里一样成为当地经济不可或缺的部分。每年都有成千上万的海螺被放在大桶里发酵，以生产更多这种深红的颜料。

original: The workshops of Rhodes are not only famous for their productivity but also their inventiveness. Over the last 200 years much have been done to perfect the art of glass casting and the island is by far the biggest center of Glass production in the Mediterranean.
translation: 罗得斯人的工坊不仅因其高产，也因其独创而遐迩闻名。在过去的两百年，罗得斯人的玻璃工艺已达到炉火纯青的地步，现在已成为地中海最大的玻璃制造中心。

original: Copper is so abundant in Cyprus that it colors the earth red, and lends its name to the island. The mines of Cyprus have supplied the Mediterranean with Copper for millennia and remain one of the richest sources of it in the known world.
translation: 塞浦路斯的铜资源是如此丰富，以至于将大地染上了红色，并且把它的名字赋予了这座岛。塞浦路斯的矿山已经为地中海地区提供铜长达数千年，并且仍然是已知世界上铜资源最丰富的地区之一。

original: This city is home to some of the richest and most easily accessible gold and silver deposits in Iberia.
translation: 这座城市是伊比利亚一些最丰富且最容易开采的金银矿床的所在地。

original: Horses from the plain of Nisea, close to Bisitun, have been used by Persian nobles and nobility for hundreds of years and their fame has made them sought after from Macedonia to the edges of India. During Achaemenid times this region was home to a royal stable, that still housed 50 000 mares when Alexander the great passed through, en route to Ecbatana.
translation: 尼萨平原邻近比索通，此处盛产的骏马供给波斯的贵族们已达数百年。尼萨马的盛名，东至马其顿，西至印度，无人不晓。在阿契美尼德王朝时期，这片区域是一处皇家马场。在亚历山大率领大军前往埃克巴坦那时，此处依然供养着约50,000匹母马。

original: A large statue to the Mother Goddess is carved into one of the local mountains.
translation: 一座巨大的大地女神雕像雕刻在当地的一座山上。

original: The last couple of years there has been issues with feeding this province.
translation: 在过去的几年中，这个省份的粮食供应一直存在着问题。

original: We have been blessed with a great harvest by the Mother Goddess.
A well known mystical Cybelene cult has appeared in this city.
translation: 著名而又神秘的库柏勒崇拜出现在该城市。

original: This city is the site of a concerted effort to administer an emergent civilization.
translation: 这个城市目前作为一个新生文明的行政中心。

original: A great lighthouse guides the way for all ships that seek the port of Alexandria.
translation: 一座伟大的灯塔为所有开往亚历山大港的船只指引方向。

original: A great lighthouse guides the way for all ships that seek the port of Alexandria.
translation: 一座伟大的灯塔为所有开往亚历山大港的船只指引方向。

original: A great lighthouse guides the way for all ships that seek the port of Alexandria.
translation: 一座伟大的灯塔为所有开往亚历山大港的船只指引方向。

original: A colossal statue of Helios in celebration of the Rhodian victory against Demetrius I the Besieger.
translation: 为了庆祝罗得岛抵抗“围城者”德米特里一世的胜利而建的赫利俄斯的巨像。

original: A colossal statue of Helios in celebration of the Rhodian victory against Demetrius I the Besieger.
translation: 为了庆祝罗得岛抵抗“围城者”德米特里一世的胜利而建的赫利俄斯的巨像。

original: The remains of the once great bronze Colossus of Rhodes, broken beyond repair.
translation: 曾经一度辉煌的罗得斯太阳神巨像，现在只剩下断壁残垣，无法修复。

original: Our nation has a well-stocked library, filled with ancient illuminating texts.
translation: 我国有一个藏书丰富的图书馆，里面满是富有启发性的古代文献。

original: Our scholars have come across some particularly rare texts.
translation: 我们的学者无意发现了一些极其罕见的文献。

original: The once great Museion of Alexandria was entirely burned to the ground, only some few remains to be seen.
translation: 曾经伟大的亚历山大缪斯神庙已经被完全烧毁，只剩下少量遗迹还能被看到。

original: This once-great city has been utterly pillaged by marauding forces.
translation: 这座曾经伟大的城市已经被劫掠的军队洗劫一空。

original: This city is the site of a concerted effort to administer an emergent civilization.
translation: 这个城市目前作为一个新生文明的行政中心。

original: This city is almost entirely destroyed by a recent earthquake.
translation: 这座城市几乎被最近的一场地震完全摧毁。

original: This city is ravaged by a recent earthquake.
translation: 这个城市最近遭到地震的毁坏。

original: This city has been affected by a recent nearby earthquake.
translation: 这个城市最近受到了地震的影响。

original: Our vast empire has begun to thrive under our administration. Industry, culture and the arts, flourish!
translation: 我们辽阔的帝国在我们的治理下繁荣富足。工业、文化和艺术，百业兴旺！

original: The consolidation of our great empire has renewed the sense of belonging throughout the realm.
translation: 我们伟大帝国的巩固重塑了全国人民的归属感。

original: Angry at our refusal to offer a better deal, a mercenary army has pillaged this city.
translation: 出于对我们拒绝提供更好待遇的愤怒，一支雇佣军洗劫了这座城市。

original: Inspired by the skills of their commander, this unit is sure to perform at peak efficiency.
translation: 收到指挥官技能的激励，这个单位目前正以最高效率作战。

original: The remains of this once great city is buried under a thick layer of volcanic ash.
translation: 曾经一度辉煌的城市，其断壁残垣被掩埋在一层厚厚的火山灰之下。

original: Large parts of the city has been ruined by a nearby volcanic eruption.
translation: 城市的大部分地区已被附近的火山爆发所摧毁。

original: The Arkadian tribes founded many of the great cities still present in the Peloponnese. Channeling this national legacy is paramount to our continued survival.
translation: 阿卡迪亚部落在伯罗奔尼撒建立了许多屹立至今的大城市。延续这一民族遗产是我们继续生存的至高法门。

original: This character is regarded as a foreign citizen by the majority of our populace. To be able to employ foreign citizens, you must first grant them citizenship rights.
translation: 该人物被我国的大多数人视为外国公民。为了能够雇用外国公民，你必须首先授予他们公民权。

original: The volcanic ash from an eruption lingers, fertilizing the land.
translation: 火山喷发产生的火山灰会遗留下来，使土地肥沃。

original: Our ancestors mastered the ways of the sea many generations before the Greeks and Persians. Now that our independence is secured, we call upon the knowledge of years, to show the world our destiny!
translation: 我们的祖先比希腊人和波斯人早很多代人就掌握了海洋的航道。既然现在我们的独立得到了保障，我们就可以以多年来的知识，向世界展示我们的天命！

original: The notorious pirates of Cilicia ravaged the Mediterranean until their suppression by Pompey in the 1st Century BC. Preying on unsuspecting merchants was a lucrative way of making a living in the ancient world.
translation: 奇里乞亚的海盗一直在地中海区域烧杀劫掠，直至公元前1世纪庞贝将其镇压。在远古时代，打劫毫无武装的商人无疑是一个十分有赚头的生计。

original: A member of the Cult of Fortune.
translation: 命运女神教派的一名成员。

original: A shrine built by the Cult of Fortune for their Goddess.
translation: 一座由命运女神教派建造的祭坛，为纪念他们崇拜的神祗。

original: A grand temple built in honor and reverence of the Goddess of Fortune.
translation: 一座为纪念命运女神而兴建的伟大神庙。

original: When not in a position of power, this character dreams only of acquiring it, and using it for nefarious purposes...
translation: 该人物梦想有一天能推翻我们的政府。

original: A large gathering of the Isis Cult.
translation: 伊西斯的崇拜者聚集于此。

original: A minor group of Isis Cult followers.
translation: 伊西斯追随者中的少数派。

original: There has been clashes between the locals and a cult in the city.
translation: 该城市的当地人和城里的一个宗教团体发生了冲突。

original: A member of the Isis Cult.
A shrine dedicated to the Egyptian goddess Isis.
translation: 一座为纪念埃及神祗伊西斯的祭坛。
#Y 招募陆军将领#!行动花费

original: One of our researchers has made a complete mess of the bureaucratic system, that will take a considerable time to remedy.
translation: 我们的一名研究者让官僚机构陷入了混乱，恢复原状尚需时日。

original: This character has been the subject of a nasty burglary, and is feeling particularly displeased right now.
translation: 该人物成为某桩可耻的盗窃案的受害者，现在正大发雷霆。

original: Everybody knows that this character was responsible for stealing money to cover debts!
translation: 所有人都知道此人曾经为了还债而偷钱！

original: This character was sorely wounded during a recent subterfuge.
translation: 该人物在最近的某次密谋中被奸人所伤。

original: This character has been imprisoned due to crushing debt. From performing manual labor, they will gain #Y 60#! @gold! per year towards working off their debt, but will also be harshly affected by the adverse working conditions. Characters in debt cannot be released until their debt is paid.
translation: 该人物因负债累累而被监禁。他们每年将从体力劳动中获得100金币用于还债，但也将受到不利的工作条件的严重影响。在还清债务之前，不得释放欠债的角色。

original: This character has managed to get rid of their crushing debt, and now lives with renewed vigor.
translation: 该人物成功摆脱了沉重的债务，现在人生焕然一新。

original: In order to pay crushing debts, this character has resorted to shady practice of underworld fighting.
translation: 为了偿还身负的重债，该人物选择在地下角斗场中摸爬滚打。

original: This character has dragged their way out of the murky world of gambling, and considers themselves a reformed citizen.
translation: 该人物已经从阴暗的赌博世界中走出来，并成为一个改过自新的公民。

original: This character will take any opportunity to earn a few coins on the side - usually to their own detriment.
translation: 该人物会利用任何机会“赚取”一些金币——但通常只会损坏他们自己。

original: This character recently defied all odds, and won a stunning victory in a bout of underworld fighting.
translation: 该人物击败了所有对手，在地下角斗场中赢得了桂冠。

original: This character recently experienced a terrible defeat in a bout of underworld fighting.
translation: 该人物最近在地下角斗场被对手揍的满地找牙。

original: This character recently lost a sum of money whilst gambling.
translation: 该人物最近在赌博中输了一笔钱。

original: This character recently made a sizable win whilst gambling.
translation: 该人物最近在赌博中赢了一笔钱。

original: This character recently lost a huge amount of money whilst gambling.
translation: 该人物最近在赌博中输了一大笔钱。

original: Athens is home to the revered Academy of Plato, and is in many ways an intellectual and cultural center of the Greek world.
translation: 雅典是柏拉图学院派的家乡，同时也是希腊世界知识与文化的中心。

original: Founded by Euclid of Megara, the school of Megara is not nearly as prestigious as some other famous philosophical schools but it would over time develop its own Dialectical school of some repute.
translation: 由墨伽拉的欧几里得创建，墨伽拉学派的名声并不逊于任何著名哲学学派。同时，墨伽拉学派自己发展出的辩证法也在哲学界有一席之地。

original: This city is home to one of the most revered centers for the worship of Asklepios in the Hellenistic World.
translation: 这座城市是希腊世界里崇拜阿斯克勒庇俄斯的一处宗教中心。

original: It seems the gods have blessed us with warmth and better growth these last years.
translation: 在过去的几年里，诸神似乎赐福与我们温暖和更好的收成。

original: This character recently converted to a different faith, and is devoutly following its tenets.
translation: 该人物最近皈依了一个不同的信仰，并虔诚地遵循它的信条。

original: This character has recently adopted the ways of a culture previously foreign to them. They are spending extra effort on trying to integrate.
translation: 该人物最近采取了一种与之前不同的文化方式。他们在尝试整合上花费了额外的努力。

original: This character recently attempted to murder a rival!
translation: 该人物最近试图谋杀一名仇敌！

original: This character was recently the target of an attempted murder by a rival!
translation: 该人物最近成为了一名仇敌的谋杀目标！

original: This value acts as a multiplier to all trade income you receive.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以所有你收到的贸易收入。

original: The number of bonus trade routes that your Capital Province receives. Each additional route allows you to import one extra trade good to your capital.
translation: 你的首都行省收到的贸易路线加成数量。每一额外的路线允许你额外进口一项商品到你的首都。

original: The number of bonus trade routes that all your Provinces receive. Each additional route allows you to import one extra trade good per province.
translation: 你的所有行省收到的贸易路线加成数量。每一额外的路线允许你额外进口一项商品你的每一个行省。

original: This city still remembers the mercy it was shown as it was conquered, and is grateful for being spared.
translation: 这座城市仍然记得它在被征服时所得到的仁慈，并对此表示感激。

original: This city was looted by a conqueror after the city was captured.
translation: 这座城市在被占领后被征服者劫掠了。

original: This city was thoroughly sacked by a conqueror after the city was captured.
translation: 这座城市在投降之后被征服者烧光抢光了。

original: We have bolstered our fleets with Carthaginian men and knowledge.
translation: 我们的舰队现在装满了迦太基人和迦太基人的知识。

original: Our men are inspired by our crushing victory over the Romans.
translation: 我们的士兵因为最近大败罗马人而斗志昂扬。

original: We have laid our hands on some of the well-known Alexandrian technology.
translation: 我们已经开始着手研究一些知名的亚历山大科技。

original: Exotic Memphian goods have spread throughout our nation.
translation: 充满异域风情的孟菲斯商品被分发到了全国上下。

original: A large cache of Tyrian resources was spread around the nation after we sacked Tyrus.
translation: 在我们洗劫提洛之后，提洛人的财富被分发到了全国上下。

original: Several of the Jerusalemite monuments now stand in our capital.
translation: 一些耶路撒冷纪念碑如今矗立在我国首都。

original: Antigonia was settled at the crossroads between Anatolia, Syria and the Mediterranean, and now these trade routes has fallen into our hands.
translation: 安提戈尼亚矗立于安纳托利昂、叙利亚和地中海的十字路口，现在这些贸易路线均落于我们之手。

original: We learnt many lessons after taking the walls of Babylon.
translation: 在攻克巴比伦的城墙后我们学到了很多教训。

original: Captured Seleucid bureaucrats have proven to be an excellent source of innovation in our own bureaucracy.
translation: 被俘的塞琉古官员为我们的官僚系统带来了极大的革新。

original: We have brought home several large monuments from Persepolis, once used to celebrate ceremonies at the old Persian capital.
translation: 我们从波斯波利斯带回来了数个大型纪念碑，其中一个曾在旧波斯都城用于庆典活动。

original: Our armies have been bolstered by the impressive War Elephants we have taken from Pataliputra.
translation: 我们从波多利弗多带回来的战象极大地提高了我们军队的战斗力。

original: We captured some of the brightest minds of the Hellenic world, when we conquered and sacked Syracusae.
translation: 在我们征服并洗劫叙拉古时，我们俘虏了一些有着希腊世界里最聪明头脑的人。

original: We have brought the thoughts, culture and ideas from some of the worlds greatest thinkers back home from Athens.
translation: 我们将一些世界上最伟大的思想家的思想，文化和理念从雅典带回了祖国。

original: Our men have both learned and taken up some of the ideas of the undefeatable Spartan infantry.
translation: 我们的士兵学会了一些不可战胜的斯巴达步兵的理念，并且接纳了它们。

original: We have brought home several of the treasures hidden away in Pella, many of them hailing from the campaigns of Alexander the Great.
translation: 我们将一部分藏在珀拉的财宝带回了家，这些财宝大多是亚历山大大帝东征时期积累的。

original: The great city of Lysimacheia was torn apart, and we have looted many valuable materials to use in our own settlements.
translation: 宏伟的吕西玛刻亚城被摧毁了，我们抢夺了很多珍贵的建材带回我们自己的聚落。

original: We have taken on some of the designs and ideas of the Rhodians, as well as taken in some of their great glass craftsmen.
translation: 我们采纳了罗德岛人提供的某些设计和理念，也带走了一部分技术最为娴熟的玻璃工匠。

original: [PROVINCE.GetName] is not in control range of [COUNTRY.GetName] because [STATE_CAPITAL.GetName] is disloyal
translation: [PROVINCE.GetName]不在[COUNTRY.GetName]的控制范围内，因为[STATE_CAPITAL.GetName]不忠

original: [PROVINCE.GetName] is not in control range of [COUNTRY.GetName] ($DISTANCE$ > [COUNTRY.GetControlRange])
This value acts as a multiplier to all tax you receive.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以所有你收到的税收。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to all tribute income you receive.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以所有你收到的上贡收入。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to your army maintenance costs.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以你的陆军维护花费。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to your naval maintenance costs.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以你的海军维护花费。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to your fort maintenance costs.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以你的堡垒维护花费。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to the wages you pay your characters.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以你发给其他人物的工资。

original: This value acts as a multiplier to the wages you pay your characters.
translation: 这个数值将会乘以你发给其他人物的工资。

original: This character was once next in-line to a foreign throne. They may seek opportunity to regain this title.
translation: 该人物曾一度是某国王位的顺位继承人。他的支持者们可能会寻求支持以夺回这个头衔。

original: The residents of this city are overjoyed to have their callous governor removed.
translation: 这座城市的居民因为其冷酷的总督被解职而欢呼雀跃。

original: This character was given a simple choice. Support our primary heir, or don't. The consequences for the latter were left loudly unspoken.
translation: 该人物被给予了一个简单的选择题。支持我们的第一继承人或者不支持。而选择后者的结果是不言而喻的。

original: This character has been granted free hands, to do as they please whilst in-office.
translation: 该人物被授予了全权，可以在职权范围内完全按照自己意愿行事。

original: This character is owed money by the state, and will get increasingly disloyal if it is not repaid.
translation: 该人物将钱财借给了国家，如果不还清的话他的忠诚度会持续下降。

original: The recent unrest among our slave population ended with the state making a number of concessions to the slaves. Guaranteeing their rights and offering them protection against abuse from Slave owners. There is also a widespread fear that any action taken might enkindle the flames of revolt once more, making many slave owners quite restrictive in how they make use of their slaves.
translation: 在国家对奴隶做出大量让步之后——通过保障他们的权利并保护他们免受奴隶主的虐待，最近奴隶中爆发的不满结束了。然而令人普遍担忧的是，叛乱之火仍然一触即发，这使得许多奴隶主在如何利用奴隶上饱受限制。

original: This city is where a large number of slaves from the recent slave revolt were allowed to settle after being given their freedom.
translation: 这座城市是最近一次奴隶叛乱的大量奴隶在获得自由后获准定居的地方。

original: This city was recently devastated by revolting slaves.
translation: 这座城市最近被叛乱的奴隶摧毁了。

original: The recent slave revolt in our empire is inspiring slaves all over the country with hope for freedom. It has also given them the courage to not tolerate abuse.\nUnless we are careful the rebellion might spread.
translation: 帝国内最近发生的奴隶叛乱鼓舞了全国的奴隶追寻自由的希望。这也给予了他们勇气来反抗虐待。\n看来如果我们不够小心，叛乱将会蔓延。

original: This city has seen an influx of traders visiting and enriching the city lately.
translation: 这座城市最近涌入了大量商人，也让城市富有了起来。

original: This city has seen an influx of new people and traders settling down in the city lately.
translation: 这座城市最近有新人口和商人涌入定居。

original: This country has seen a large influx of traders lately.
translation: 这个国家最近有大量商人涌入。

original: This country has seen an influx of traders lately.
translation: 这个国家最近有商人涌入。

original: This city has seen an influx of traders visiting and enriching the city lately.
translation: 这座城市最近涌入了大量商人，也让城市富有了起来。

original: This city has seen an influx of new people and traders settling down in the city lately.
translation: 这座城市最近有新人口和商人涌入定居。

original: After new settlers arrived in the city, there has been some clashes and disagreements with the locals who have lived here for a long time.
translation: 在这个城市定居之后，新移民与常住于此的当地人产生了许多争吵与冲突。

original: New settlers has caused some disturbances in the city after settling down.
translation: 新移民定居后在该城市引发了一些骚乱。

original: The locals are outraged by recent actions committed by their ruler.
translation: 当地人对他们的统治者最近的行为感到愤怒。

original: Our armies have been drilled into an experienced unstoppable unit.
translation: 我们的陆军已被训练成一支经验丰富，势不可挡的部队。

original: Our armies have been drilled into an experienced unstoppable unit.
translation: 我们的陆军已被训练成一支经验丰富，势不可挡的部队。

original: Our armies have been drilled into an experienced unstoppable unit.
translation: 我们的陆军已被训练成一支经验丰富，势不可挡的部队。

original: Our nation is known far and wide for its flourishing merchants and exotic trade goods.
translation: 我国因其繁荣的商业和外来贸易品驰名。

original: Our nation is known far and wide for its flourishing merchants and exotic trade goods.
translation: 我国因其繁荣的商业和外来贸易品驰名。

original: Our nation is known far and wide for its flourishing merchants and exotic trade goods.
translation: 我国因其繁荣的商业和外来贸易品驰名。

original: Our people live in peace, and our lands flourish with abundance.
translation: 我们的人民安居乐业，我们的土地繁荣富足。

original: Our people live in peace, and our lands flourish with abundance.
translation: 我们的人民安居乐业，我们的土地繁荣富足。

original: Our people live in peace, and our lands flourish with abundance.
translation: 我们的人民安居乐业，我们的土地繁荣富足。

original: This city is struggling with bandits and outlaws.
translation: 这座城市正与强盗和歹徒斗争。

original: Our people are angry at our loyalty to an unfit overlord.
translation: 人民对我们仍忠于不合格的宗主国而感到愤怒。

original: Our bureaucracy is stretched too thin to take care of our people.
translation: 我们的官僚机构过小，不足以涵盖我们人民的全部诉求。

original: Your Ruler has been granted a term of 12 additional months without being forced to stand down.
translation: 你的统治者被授予了额外12个月的统治期，在此期间不会下台。

original: Harder and more durable than other Iron ore the quarries of Noricum have the abilty to arm entire hosts with their readily available quality metal.
translation: 诺里克出产的矿石比普通的铁矿石更加硬、更加耐久，这能让我们有能力给一整个大队提供品质更高的武装。

original: Our overlord refused our gifted advisor, an insult to our nation.
translation: 我们的宗主拒绝接受我们才华横溢的顾问，这对我们国家来说是侮辱。

original: We have broken our part of the contract with our overlord, becoming more popular among our people.
translation: 我们撕毁了同宗主的部分条约，这在我们的人民中引起了正面反响。

original: Our overlord has temporarily bought our loyalty.
translation: 我们的宗主国暂时收买了我们的忠诚。

original: Our bureaucracy has failed in keeping all our subjects happy.
translation: 我们的官僚机构未能使所有附庸国满意。

original: We have shown loyalty to our overlord even though they have shown to be unfit to rule us.
translation: 我们忠于我们的宗主国，即使他们的表现并不适合统治我们。

original: In an effort to make a noteworthy example we have crucified all but the least important among the recent slave revolters.
translation: 为了杀鸡儆猴，我们已经把最近的奴隶起义者中地位最低的人钉死在了十字架上。

original: We have not made an example of the culprits in the recent Slave Revolt. Every survivor has been allowed to return to a life in bondage, without any further punishment.
translation: 在最近的奴隶起义中，我们没有杀鸡儆猴。每一个幸存者都被允许回到奴隶生活中，而且不再受到任何惩罚。

original: This region is famed for the translucent stone known as Lapis Specularis. This valuable material is easy to work with and can be both cut and split into fine translucent sheets of any size. Lapis Specularis is in demand throughout the Mediterranean and the many mines in this area are particularly suited to meet that demand.
translation: 这个区域以半透明的石头而闻名，这种石头被称为“石膏”。这种有价值的材料易于加工，可以被切割和分成任何尺寸的半透明薄片。整个地中海地区都需要石膏，该地区的许多矿山相当适合满足这种需求。

original: Our soldiers are secure in the knowledge we are following the teachings of Zoroaster
translation: 我们的士兵在知识方面有保障因为我们遵循琐罗亚斯德的教诲。

original: Our nation is secure in the knowledge we are following the teachings of Zoroaster.
translation: 我们的国家在知识方面有保障因为我们遵循琐罗亚斯德的教诲。

original: The loyalty of this character is being bought by a foreign power!
translation: 这个人物的忠诚被外国势力收买了。

original: The city has seen some unrest after some of its people were forcefully converted to another religion.
translation: 在一些人被迫改信了另一种宗教后，这座城市出现了一些骚乱。

original: The city has seen a flourishing relationship between people of diverse faiths after the minorities were treated with tolerance.
translation: 在宗教少数派得到宽容对待之后，在这个城市已经能够看到不同信仰的人们欣欣向荣。

original: A shrine built in hopes of gaining the blessing of the Goddess to increase the population of the city.
translation: 一座祭坛被建造以得到女神的祝福来增加城市的人口。

original: Our nation is receiving the support of a highly influential family, making it much easier to grease the palms of hard-to-please governors.
translation: 我们的国家正受到一个有高度影响力的家族的支持，这使得搞定那些难以取悦的总督们变得容易多了。

original: Some of the youth of the city are partaking in ancient fertility rites.
translation: 这个城市里的一些年轻人参加了古老的生育仪式。

original: This city is struggling with unrest.
translation: 这座城市正与不满斗争。

original: Well known holy site for Hindu pilgrims.
translation: 著名的印度教朝圣者的圣地。

original: Well known holy site for Hindu pilgrims.
translation: 著名的印度教朝圣者的圣地。

original: A large festival was held all across the nation to inspire the populace.
translation: 全国各地举办了一个大型节日，以激励民众。

original: A festival was held in the most important cities of the nation to inspire the populace.
translation: 全国各地的重要城市举行了节日以激励民众。

original: A guru teacher is guiding the populace of the city.
translation: 一位上师会引导我们城市中的民众。

original: This city is known for the cooperation and relations between the people of different faiths living there.
translation: 这座城市以不同信仰的居民之间的协作和关系而闻名。

original: Lived a previous life as a wiseman, bringing insight and wisdom to those around them.
translation: 在前世作为一位智者，为周围的人带来了慧眼和灵光。

original: Lived a previous life as a reformer of their nation, playing an important role in changing the political landscape.
translation: 在前世作为一位国家的改革者，在改变国家政治面貌的过程中扮演了重要的角色。

original: Lived a previous life as a great general, crushing their enemies with ease.
translation: 在前世作为一名伟大将军，轻而易举击溃敌军。

original: Lived a previous life as a wise philosopher, using their words to win their battles.
translation: 在前世作为一名睿智的哲学家，以口舌取胜。

original: A cult venerating our ancestors has become an important part of the daily life of those living in the city, looking to the past for guidance.
translation: 对于生活在这座城市中的人来说，敬拜我们的祖先，寻求逝者指引已经成为了日常生活中的重要部分。

original: A cult venerating our ancestors has become prominent in our nation, looking to the past for guidance.
translation: 在我们国家敬拜我们的祖先，寻求逝者指引已经非常重要。

original: Parts of the city has fallen into disrepair after some of the citizens left for the countryside.
translation: 在部分民众搬往郊区之后城市中有的部分已经年久失修。

original: We have removed the ancestor cult that plagued our nation and harassed our citizens.
translation: 我们已经消除了散布于我们国家并困扰我们民众的祖先崇拜。

original: Efforts were made to recentralize authority in the city.
translation: 努力使该城市重新中央集权化。

original: The people of the city are free to follow, preach and believe in whatever religion they wish.
translation: 这座城市的人民可以自由遵循，传播和信仰任何他们愿意的宗教。

original: A wandering wiseman is teaching some of the people living in the city.
translation: 一位流浪智者正在教授一些这座城市中的居民。

original: We have built a grand temple, inspiring our populace to greater deeds than ever.
translation: 我们建造了一所宏伟神庙，激励我们的人民走向更加辉煌的明天。

original: A grand temple built to worship the one and only God, in the image of the Temple of Jerusalem.
translation: 一座宏伟的神殿，以耶路撒冷神殿的形象崇拜唯一的神。

original: This city has shown a lack of faith and loyalty to our nation and God.
translation: 这座城市对我们的国家和神明缺乏信仰和忠诚。

original: We have learned a lot from our diverse Hellenistic neighbors.
translation: 我们从不同的希腊化邻居那里学到了很多东西。

original: In the face of polytheistic worshipers, we have stuck to our ancient traditions.
translation: 面对多神论崇拜者，我们坚持古老的传统。

original: We have received the blessing of the God of War himself.
translation: 我们已经收到了战争之神的祝福。

original: There is unrest in the city after being forcefully and brutally converted to another religion.
translation: 在被粗暴地强迫改信另一个宗教之后，这座城市发生了骚乱。

original: A shrine dedicated to our patron god, inspiring the local populace and those visiting the city.
translation: 一座专用于我们保护神的神庙，激励当地和到访这座城市的人民。

original: This character is certain in the strength given to them by the royal god Thagimasadas.
translation: 此人确信自己处于皇家守护神撒基玛萨德斯赐予他们的力量之中。

original: This character is known as the champion of the royal god Thagimasadas.
translation: 这个人物被公认为是撒基玛萨德斯的冠军。

original: The nation gave some of its wealth to ascetics rather than taking it for itself.
translation: 国家把一些财富捐给了修道者，占为己有。

original: The nation has tried to teach temperance and patience to those who do not follow the ethical code of the Jainists.
translation: 国家试图向那些不遵守耆那教徒道德准则的人传授节制和耐心。

original: This character has entirely broken with some of the vows of the Jainist faith.
translation: 此人完全背弃了一些耆那教信仰的誓言。

original: The free folk of our realm mourn in solidarity for the death of our great Olympic athlete, finding common ground in their will to succeed even in the face adversity or death.
translation: 我们国家的自由民共同为我们伟大的奥运会运动员的死而哀悼，他们即使面对逆境或死亡时也要取得成功的意志力这一点上是共通的。

original: This city benefits from the legacy Alexander left behind.
translation: 这座城市受益于亚历山大留下的遗产。

original: A local philosopher is espousing his views in the city.
translation: 一位本地的哲学家在城里发表他的观点。

original: A local philosopher is espousing his views in the city.
translation: 一位本地的哲学家正在城里发表他的观点。

original: A local philosopher is espousing his views in the city.
translation: 一位本地的哲学家正在城里发表他的观点。

original: A local philosopher is espousing his views in the city.
translation: 一位本地的哲学家正在城里发表他的观点。

original: A local philosopher is espousing his views in the city.
translation: 一位本地的哲学家正在城里发表他的观点。
欣欣向荣的希腊—波斯行政机关

original: The Greco-Persian administration in charge of the city has been doing exceedingly well lately.
translation: 主管这座城市的希腊—波斯行政机关最近表现得非常好。

original: The administration in charge of the city has struggled dealing with the diverse elements under its control.
translation: 主管这座城市的行政机关一直在竭力处理其控制下的各种因素。

original: We have seen an increase in trade with one of our neighbors.
translation: 我们能看到我们与其中的一个邻居的贸易增加了。

original: The city held city games that was a great success, and it will be remembered for a while.
translation: 这座城市举办了一场非常成功的城市运动会，这将被铭记一段时间。

original: This city was ransacked by a mercenary force, bitter about their lack of pay!
translation: 这座城市被一支气愤于欠薪的雇佣兵军队洗劫了！

original: One of the legendary veterans of Alexander's army.
translation: 亚历山大军队的传奇老兵之一。

original: The bonds between the diverse population under our rule has been strengthened as of late.
translation: 我们统治下多样化的人口之间的关系最近更亲近了。

original: Our diverse population is straining our administration.
translation: 我们多样化的人口使我们的行政机关陷入了困境。

original: This character was once in the line of succession to a throne. Their struggle, as well as skill at thinking outside the box, makes them a highly qualified and popular leader.\n\n#G If this character returns to the nation they were once in the line of succession for, they may attempt to start a coup.#!
translation: 这个角色曾经有过王位继承权。他们不屈不挠的精神，以及独辟蹊径的思维能力，使得他们成为了非常够格和受欢迎的领袖。\n\n#G 如果这个角色回到他们曾经有继承权的国家，他们可能会尝试发动政变。！ #!

original: We recently encouraged a disloyal general to become a mercenary. On their recommendation, other mercenaries will be less likely to do business with us for some time.
translation: 我们最近怂恿了一位不忠的将军成为一名雇佣兵。据他们声称，其他雇佣兵在一段时间内将不太可能与我们做生意。

original: This character has finally returned to their roots, having engaged in a successful career as a mercenary. Who knows what their agenda appears to be now?\n\n#G This modifier will be removed if the character reaches#! #Y 60#! #G loyalty.#!
translation: 这个人物在以雇佣兵的身份取得了成功之后，最终回到了家乡。谁知道他们现在的计划是什么？\n\n#G 如果人物的忠诚度达到#! #Y 60#!#G ，这一修正会被移除。#!

original: Always one of the greatest harbors in the Punic world the Carthaginian Military Harbor has been restructured for greater efficiency as the empire and the city itself has grown. The Harbor and the associated shipyards significantly improves the shipbuilding capability of this city.
translation: 作为布匿世界最伟大的港口之一，迦太基港为了以更高的效率服务帝国及迦太基城自身进行了扩建。港口及其附带的船坞极大地增强了这座城市的造船能力。

original: We have a close relationship with several mercenary warlords who has settled down locally. As our patronage is deeply appreciated, their loyalty comes at a cheaper price than it otherwise would have.
translation: 我们与数个已经在当地定居下来的雇佣军阀结成了亲密的关系。由于他们对我们的资助十分感激，我们能以更低的价格买下他们为我们效力。

original: The Campus Martius outside of Roma has been expanded to include new temples and a greater area for new recruits to train and prepare themselves for war.
translation: 罗马城外的战神广场目前已扩建完毕，扩建的广场包括了几座新的神庙以及一片范围更大的用于训练新兵投入战争的场地。

original: Our recent religious conversion has not only been a change in policy at the state level, it has also helped our new faith gain traction among the populace.
translation: 我们最近的改信不仅成为国家政策上的改变，也帮助我们的新信仰在民众间获得了牵引力。

original: This character is receiving financial aid from a rich, disloyal friend.
translation: 这个人物正在接受财务援助，其来源于一位富有又不忠的朋友。

original: This character is supporting the secessionist desires of a powerful friend.
translation: 这个人物正在支持一位有权力的朋友的分离主义欲望。

original: Embellished Temple of Jupiter Optimus Maximus
The Temple of Jupiter Optimus Maximus has been embellished with treasures and war spoils.
translation: 朱庇特神庙已经被珍宝和战利品修饰了。

original: The noble elite are fuming at our inclusion of commoners in our military. They'll get used to it eventually...
translation: 贵族精英对我们将平民纳入军队一事感到愤怒。他们最终会习惯的······

original: We have made sweeping changes to the modernization process for our military.
translation: 我们对军队进行了全面的新式改革。

original: The aristorcacy are very relieved that we rejected recent proposed reforms.
translation: 贵族们如释重负，因为我们最近拒绝了改革提议。

original: Time and energy has been invested in keeping the province capital loyal to the Roman cause.
translation: 我们在此处投入了大量时间和精力，以保证该行省的首府忠于罗马的事业。

original: We have formed a city league the size of which the world has rarely seen. One where the freedom of the Greek cities will forever be safeguarded against tyranny.
translation: 我们已经成立了一个城邦联盟，其规模当世罕见。在这一联盟保护之下，希腊诸城邦的自由休想被暴君染指。

original: This is the capital of a great league of cities. As such it enjoys many benefits, and a much increased influx of immigration.
translation: 此处是城邦联盟的首都。正因如此该城享受到了诸多好处，并且有大量移民涌入。

original: We have re-united Alexander the Great's Empire. Creating a grand Hellenistic enterprise straddling the known world.
translation: 我们已经重新统一了亚历山大大帝的帝国。我们建立的泛希腊帝国将横跨整个已知世界。

original: With the re-unification of Alexander's Empire this city has become the great capital of the entire Hellenistic world. A true beacon of Greek and Graeco-Hellenic culture, unrivaled by any other city.
translation: 随着亚历山大帝国的重新统一，这座城市成为整个希腊化世界的伟大首都。一个希腊人和希腊文化的真正灯塔，任何其他城市都无法与之匹敌。
帝都印度河畔的亚历山大里亚

original: With the re-unification of Alexander's Empire this city has become the great capital of the entire Hellenistic world. A true beacon of Greek and Graeco-Indian culture, unrivaled by any other city.
translation: 随着亚历山大帝国的重新统一，这座城市成为整个希腊化世界的伟大首都。一个希腊人和希腊-印度文化的真正灯塔，任何其他城市都无法与之匹敌。

original: With the re-unification of Alexander's Empire this city has become the great capital of the entire Hellenistic world. A true beacon of Greek and Graeco-Hellenic culture, unrivaled by any other city.
translation: 随着亚历山大帝国的重新统一，这座城市成为整个希腊化世界的伟大首都。一个希腊人和希腊文化的真正灯塔，任何其他城市都无法与之匹敌。

original: With the re-unification of Alexander's Empire this city has become the great capital of the entire Hellenistic world. A true beacon of Greek and Macedonian, unrivaled by any other city.
translation: 随着亚历山大帝国的重新统一，这座城市成为整个希腊化世界的伟大首都。一个希腊人和马其顿人的真正灯塔，任何其他城市都无法与之匹敌。

original: With the re-unification of Alexander's Empire this city has become the great capital of the entire Hellenistic world.
translation: 随着亚历山大帝国的重新统一，这座城市成为整个希腊化世界的伟大首都。

original: Having united all of the lands of Bharata we are now presiding over a universal Empire, a country built to last for millennia.
translation: 我们统一了婆罗多所有的土地，我们现在掌管着一个普世帝国，一个建立就是为了存在千年的国家。

original: This city is the capital of a subcontinent-spanning empire. A city unrivaled by any other in the world.
translation: 这座城市是一个横跨次大陆的帝国的国都。一个世界上其他城市无法与之匹敌的城市。

original: Garum, the famous fish sauce, is popular all around the Mediterranean. In no other place is this exquisite condiment so well prepared and made in such big quantities as here however.
translation: 伽迪耳的鱼酱，著名的鱼酱，在地中海周边很受欢迎。不过，在其他任何地方，这种精致的调味品都没有像这里的一样被精心准备和大量制作。

original: With the death of Antigonus and the apparent collapse of the Antigonid cause the loyalty of many parts of the empire is wavering.
translation: 随着安提柯一世的逝去和安提柯明显的崩溃，帝国许多地区的忠诚都在动摇。

original: With the death of Antigonus after a series of successful campaigns the future of the Antigonid empire looks bright. Inspiring the free Greek cities to flock to the Antigonid banners.
translation: 在安提柯一世逝去后，一系列成功的战役使得安提柯帝国的未来看上去很光明，这激励了自由的希腊城邦蜂拥到安提柯的旗帜下。

original: There are some unrest between groups of Buddhists, after a lot of people have claimed to be Buddhist simply to get some of the gold that was given to them.
translation: 佛教团体之间出现了一些动乱，很多人声称自己是佛教徒却只是为了得到一些给佛教徒的黄金。

original: This city is being taught by Buddhist Monks.
translation: 这座城市处于佛教僧侣的教导下。

original: We have united the Dahae tribes and enjoy the benefits of a strong and well coordinated tribal army.
translation: 我们统一了大益的部落，并且受益于一支强大且配合协调的部落军队。

original: During your training as a ruler the loyalty of all troops cannot be in question.
translation: 在你作为统治者训练时，所有军队的忠诚度都不会有问题。

original: This character is unable to take office due to being outmaneuvered politically, negligence, or incompetence.
translation: 这个人物由于政治原因被排挤、玩忽职守或不胜任而不能担任职务。

original: This character was ransomed from a fearsome enemy, for great cost to the state. They remain in a state of perpetual gratitude.
translation: 这个人物被从一个可怕的敌人手中赎回，为此国家付出了巨大的代价。他们将始终处于感激的状态。
骆驼骑兵平原战斗加成

original: The magnificent Mausoleum of Mausolus stands as a testament to the efforts of Mausolus to turn Halicarnassus into one of the foremost cities of the Aegean.
translation: 宏伟的马乌索卢斯陵墓是马乌索卢斯努力将哈利卡纳苏斯变成爱琴海最重要的城市之一的证明。

original: Having been rebuilt for the third time by Alexander the Great the Artemis Temple at Ephesus is one of the most prominent temples in the Hellenic world.
translation: 亚力山大大帝第三次重建了以弗所的阿耳忒弥斯神庙，它是希腊世界最著名的神庙之一。

original: The temple of Zeus at Olympia is one of the foremost centers of worship in the Hellenic world. The Zeus statue itself being especially lauded both for its size and stile.
translation: 奥林匹亚宙斯神庙是希腊世界最重要的崇拜中心之一，宙斯巨像因其大小和阶梯而备受赞誉。

original: The mythical pillars of Hercules mark the end of the Mediterranean and are an excellent base for the control of North African and Hispanic shipping.
translation: 神话般的海格力斯之柱标志着地中海的尽头，也是控制北非和西班牙航运的绝佳基地。

original: Controlling the narrow Hellespont strait allows for more efficient taxation of maritime trade as well as being an ideal place for defensive installations.
translation: 控制狭长的赫勒斯滂海峡不仅可以提高海上贸易的税收效率，而且它是修造防御设施的理想场所。

original: The importance of the Bosphorus strait has allowed its owner strategic control of maritime trade for many generations.
translation: 博斯普鲁斯海峡的重要性使其拥有者能够对海上贸易进行长期的战略控制。

original: Having withstood the siege of even Demetrius Poliorcetes the fortifications of Rhodes have achieved a legendary status unmatched by any other in the Mediterranean.
translation: 罗得斯防御工事经受了无数围攻，即便是德米特里一世也未能攻下它，这也使它在地中海地区得到了无与伦比的传奇地位。

original: This family head is outraged at our treatment of their dynasty.\n\n#TF This modifier will be removed if the character reaches#! #Y 33#! #TF loyalty.#!
translation: 这个家族的首领对我们给予他们家族的待遇感到愤怒。\n\n#TF 如果人物的忠诚度达到#! #Y 33#!#TF ，这一修正会被移除。#!

original: This character has been granted increased wage allowances by the state.
translation: 该人物被国家授予了增加工资津贴的优待。

original: Key infrastructure of this city has been razed to the ground!
translation: 这座城市的关键基础设施已经被付之一炬！

original: This value is a modifier to the chance to capture pops when sieging an enemy city. If multiple pops would be captured, it can also increase the maximum number taken.
translation: 该值表示在围攻敌方城市时能够俘虏人口的几率。如果俘虏了多个人口，该值也能增加最大携带人口数。

original: Your people have left their tribal past behind them and are now embracing a new future. In time the changes to our society will be the new status quo and new conflicts will brew but right now most things in our society are pulling in the same direction.
translation: 你的人民正逐渐离开部落，并开始接纳一个崭新的未来。日新月异的变化将是我们社会的现状，新的冲突也在酝酿之中。不过至少到目前为止，我们的社会正向着同一个方向前进。

original: We have reclaimed the legacy of the Achaemenid Empire and built a new Persian Empire. From all corners of Iran people are now flocking to our banners, to again make Persia the hegemony it once was.
translation: 我们已经拿回了阿契美尼德帝国的遗产，并且建立了一个新的波斯帝国。现在伊朗各个角落的人民都聚集到我们旗下，为了让波斯再一次成为过去那样的霸主。

original: The Suebi are finally united under our benevolent rule. Our golden era has truly arrived.
translation: 苏维比人终于在我们的仁慈的治下统一起来了。我们的黄金时代已经来临。

original: The people of India share many values in common with us. A shared sense of the majesty of empire, and the reverence for the awe of the divine. Through our interest in this region, we open up many avenues in terms of diplomacy and integration.
translation: 印度人民与我们有着非常相似的价值观。比如对帝国的崇拜以及对神明的尊敬。基于对这一地区的兴趣，我们有很多实现政治目标及整合的方法。

original: The people of this province are outraged at our refusal to let them serve under a famous commander.
translation: 这个省份的人民愤怒于我们拒绝让他们接受一位著名指挥官的领导。
